Hello,
My name is Yi-Wen Lin (Wen). I am a freelance creative coder and generative artist that based in London. After living in western culture for all these years, I am still attached to the eastern culture and get even more inspired by it now. Not only working with eastern culture element, I am trying to combine different culture elements that I get from all these years living in foreign countries.

I am a fast learner and enjoy particularly working in a team with different backgrounds. I am welcome to all kinds of new challenges. Feel free to contact me at here.

Here are some links to my projects / experiments.

Sketches / Vimeo / Codevember / Twitter / Instagram
